metadata.description: Transform Claude Code into a thoughtful development partner with requirements clarification, implementation planning, and breakthrough generation

plugins.name: thoughtful-dev
plugins.description: Complete thoughtful development workflow with 3 core skills: requirements-clarifier (prevents premature coding), implementation-planner (analyzes approaches and risks), and breakthrough-generator (systematic problem-solving when stuck). Includes safety-first git workflow, black-box architecture principles, and progressive documentation templates.

plugins.name: github-push-pr
plugins.description: Complete GitHub workflow automation with security-first approach. Enforces feature branch workflow, runs security checks, creates PRs via GitHub CLI, and iterates on ClaudeBot feedback automatically. Includes 4 skills: git-workflow-enforcer, pr-creator, claudebot-feedback-loop, and thoughtful-pr-workflow.
